    D

    database - package database
    Contains repository classes that provide data access and persistence.
    DataSaveController - Class in controller
    Controller responsible for loading and saving repository CSV files from/to the configured base data directory.
    DataSaveController(StudentRepository, CompanyRepRepository, CareerCenterStaffRepository, InternshipRepository, ApplicationRepository, WithdrawalRequestRepository) - Constructor for class controller.DataSaveController
    Creates a DataSaveController using the default data directory `src/data`.
    DataSaveController(StudentRepository, CompanyRepRepository, CareerCenterStaffRepository, InternshipRepository, ApplicationRepository, WithdrawalRequestRepository, Path) - Constructor for class controller.DataSaveController
    Creates a DataSaveController with an explicit base directory for CSV files.
    decrementConfirmedSlots() - Method in class entity.Internship
    Releases a previously confirmed slot.
    deleteAll() - Method in class database.ApplicationRepository
    Deletes all applications from the repository.
    deleteAll() - Method in class database.CareerCenterStaffRepository
    Deletes all staff members from the repository.
    deleteAll() - Method in class database.CompanyRepRepository
    Deletes all company representatives from the repository.
    deleteAll() - Method in interface database.CrudRepository
    Deletes all entities managed by the repository.
    deleteAll() - Method in class database.InternshipRepository
    Deletes all internships from the repository.
    deleteAll() - Method in class database.StudentRepository
    Deletes all students from the repository.
    deleteAll() - Method in class database.WithdrawalRequestRepository
    Deletes all withdrawal requests from the repository.
    deleteAllById(Iterable) - Method in interface database.CrudRepository
    Deletes all entities with the given identifiers.

    Deletes all applications with the specified IDs.
    deleteAllById(Iterable) - Method in class database.CareerCenterStaffRepository
    Deletes all staff members with the specified user IDs.
    deleteAllById(Iterable) - Method in class database.CompanyRepRepository
    Deletes all company representatives with the specified email addresses.
    deleteAllById(Iterable) - Method in class database.InternshipRepository
    Deletes all internships with the specified IDs.
    deleteAllById(Iterable) - Method in class database.StudentRepository

    deleteById(ID) - Method in interface database.CrudRepository
    Deletes the entity with the given identifier.
    deleteById(String) - Method in class database.ApplicationRepository
    Deletes an application by its ID.
    deleteById(String) - Method in class database.CareerCenterStaffRepository
    Deletes a staff member by their user ID.
    deleteById(String) - Method in class database.CompanyRepRepository
    Deletes a company representative by their email address.
    deleteById(String) - Method in class database.InternshipRepository
    Deletes an internship by its ID.
    deleteById(String) - Method in class database.StudentRepository

    deleteByStudent(String) - Method in class database.ApplicationRepository

    deleteInternship(String, String) - Method in class controller.CompanyRepController
    Deletes an internship posting if allowed by its status.
    displayCancelMessage() - Method in class boundary.BaseBoundary

    displayLoginHelp() - Method in class boundary.LoginBoundary
